label: 国司
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: The administrative team that was appointed and sent out from the capital to manage a provincial headquarters. It including four ranks of managers-director (kami), vice-director (suke), facilities manager (jō), and superintendent of records (sakan)-plus clerks (shishō). [守（かみ）、介（すけ）、掾（じょう）、目（さかん）、史生]
